name: ArchMMO 2
description: ArchMMO 2 is a Voxel 3D MMORPG with races, factions, guilds, parties, pets, mounts, PvP, PvE, quests, and an open-world map! Explore the world of Arch today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3-4130 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT 630 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-5500U Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950FTW DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound
